features: SUPERIOR COMFORT — Unlike traditional circular ear buds, the design of EarPods is defined by the geometry of the ear. Which makes them more comfortable for more people than any other ear bud–style headphones.
HIGH-QUALITY AUDIO — The speakers inside EarPods have been engineered to maximize sound output and minimize sound loss, which means you get high-quality audio.

BUILT-IN REMOTE — EarPods with Lightning Connector also include a built-in remote that lets you adjust the volume, control the playback of music and video, and answer or end calls with a pinch of the cord.
COMPATIBILITY — Works with all devices that have a Lightning connector and support iOS 10 or later, including iPod touch, iPad, and iPhone. Also works with iPad models with iPadOS.
INTEGRATED MICROPHONE — A built-in microphone precisely captures your voice while you’re on the phone, taking a FaceTime call, or summoning Siri — so you’re always heard loud and clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, Reliable, and Still Rocking
reviews.reviewText: Design & Comfort: ⭐⭐⭐⭐Let's start with the design. Classic Apple – sleek, white, and instantly recognizable. The EarPods are the Frank Sinatra of earbuds, timeless and effortlessly cool. The fit is surprisingly snug, and they won't be doing acrobatics in your ears if you decide to break into an impromptu dance.Audio Quality: ⭐⭐⭐⭐While they won't make you feel like you're front row at a concert, the audio quality is commendable for the price. Crisp highs, decent mids, and enough bass to keep your head nodding. Whether you're jamming to Taylor Swift or getting lost in a podcast, the EarPods handle it with finesse.Built-in Remote: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The built-in remote is a game-changer. Need to skip that Taylor Swift ballad because it's hitting too close to home? Just a click away. Got an incoming call from your boss during your power walk? Answer it without breaking your stride. The remote is a small but mighty feature that puts control at your fingertips.Compatibility with USB-C: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The move to USB-C is a welcomed upgrade. No more flipping the connector three times to get it right – it's the little things, right? Plus, it plays well with newer devices, keeping you in sync with the times.Durability: ⭐⭐⭐⭐For a pair of wired earbuds, they're surprisingly durable. I've accidentally tossed them in my bag with keys and survived without a scratch. The cable isn't the type to unravel into a spaghetti mess after one too many rounds in your pocket, and that's a win in my book.Price: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Let's talk about the elephant in the room – the price. These EarPods won't break the bank, and considering the brand and the performance, they're a steal. Apple delivers the quality you expect without gouging your wallet.Conclusion:In a world filled with flashy competitors, the Apple EarPods with USB-C are a reliable, no-nonsense option. They won't make you the envy of the audiophile community, but they'll get the job done – and they'll do it well. Whether you're a casual listener or someone who just wants a solid pair of earbuds that won't let you down, these EarPods are a solid choice. Simple, reliable, and still rocking – just like your favorite classic tune.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Apple EarPods with Lightning Connector - Simple Excellence!
reviews.reviewText: In a nutshell, the Apple EarPods with Lightning Connector simply work great. The wired ear buds offer a straightforward solution for iPhone users, and here's why I love them:Effortless Functionality:These EarPods seamlessly integrate with my iPhone. The built-in remote allows me to control music, phone calls, and volume effortlessly. It's a simple yet effective design that enhances user experience.Clear and Crisp Sound:The sound quality is crisp and clear, delivering the signature Apple audio excellence. Whether I'm enjoying music or taking calls, the EarPods consistently deliver a reliable and enjoyable listening experience.Lightning Connector Convenience:The Lightning connector provides a hassle-free connection to my iPhone. No more dealing with tangled wires or adapters. It's a convenient and straightforward solution that aligns with Apple's commitment to user-friendly design.Built for Comfort:The EarPods are designed for comfort during extended use. The fit is snug and secure, making them ideal for various activities, from commuting to workouts. They stay in place without causing discomfort.Durable and Well-Made:The build quality of Apple products is always commendable, and the EarPods are no exception. They feel sturdy and well-made, ensuring durability that withstands daily use.Perfect for On-the-Go:These EarPods are my go-to choice for on-the-go listening. They're compact and easy to carry, making them perfect for travel, commuting, or simply enjoying music wherever I go.Affordable Apple Quality:The affordability of these EarPods doesn't compromise on Apple's quality. They provide an accessible entry into the world of Apple audio excellence without breaking the bank.In conclusion, the Apple EarPods with Lightning Connector deliver exactly what I need: reliable functionality, clear sound, and the comfort of a well-designed product. If you're in search of hassle-free wired ear buds for your iPhone, these EarPods are a solid choice.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buen sonido y súper suaves y cómodos
reviews.reviewText: Muy buena calidad y precio. Son originales.
As always this headphone works as it should, good mic and reliable.
Som ótimo e super confortável. Chegou na caixinha em perfeito estado.
Rien à dire.Envoi rapide.Produit original apple.Conforme.

Mi aspettavo una confezione da mercato parallelo... ed invece ho ricevuto una confezione super, quindi decisamente originale.Ho provato varia alternative economiche prima, ma tutte fallite. Quindi ci tocca spendere questi soldi per forza.Qualità suono non super, anzi a volte capita che non mi sentono. Prezzo decisamente eccessivo per un accessorio "consumabile" per mia opinione.Comunque ripeto, non c'è alternativa migliore se non comprare qui.
